directions: Combine cream of chicken soup, cream of mushroom soup and water in a large pot or saucepan over medium low heat. Add chicken and cook, stirring, until heated through. Stir in peas, heat through, and serve over toast.
ingredients: 3 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of chicken soup
3 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 pound boneless chicken breast halves, cooked and diced
title: Super Fast and Easy Chicken a la King
